scenario_text.value: Shuuji!
...No answer. Maybe he didn’t hear us?
Looks like he can’t hear Lopmon, either.
Maybe I should get closer...
Shuuji! Are you okay?!
Ahh! ...Oh, it’s, it’s you, Takuma.

Thank goodness we were able to find you.
You’re not hurt, are you?
No...no, I’m fine. It’s nothing...

You sure? You’re sweating like a pig, and
you’re as pale as a ghost.
Nnngh...
Shu... Shuuji...
Stay, stay away from me, you MONSTER!
Hey! What’re you doing?!
Shut up! All you monsters stay away from me!

I’m scared... What are these things...
Leave me alone...

(I wonder if Shuuji saw a longer vision than
the rest of us?)

(If so, his reaction would be understandable.
He’s been that way from the start...)

(Those visions may be rough to watch, but the
memory of one may be even harder to stomach.)

Sorry, I lost my head there for a second.
I’m better now.

Yeah, I’m okay... I have to be. So none of us
are sacrificed, and we can all go home...

Even Ryo was saved, so...it’s fine... I’m
just fine...

Hey, man, simmer down, already. Take a sec
to take a breath and—
I said I’m FINE!
Yow!

Ah... Uh, sorry, really. I’m... I’m calm,
I swear.
It’s just... Ryo...

I may be a spineless coward, but... I’m fine
now. Please don’t worry.

Or am I fine? Really? Maybe something’s wrong
with me...

Don’t worry about it, Shuuji! We were doing
just fine even without you!
I see... Yeah... Who needs someone like me...
Oops. Did I just make things worse...?

Obviously! Do you seriously have no idea what
you should or shouldn’t say?!

I get you wanted to make him feel better, but
there’s such a thing as time and place.
I’m sorry!

I think that guy’s lost it. Better watch him,
Kaito.

Lost it... You think his screws finally came
loose?

Yeah. Well, I can’t say how things’ll go from
here... I guess that’s up to him.
So then there ain’t nothing we can do?

Hey, so we’re going to talk to someone who
knows more about this world—the enemy, right?
That’s right.
Now that I think about it...

I hate to say it, but Arukenimon is the only
one that seems like she’d actually listen.

The blood goes straight to Garurumon’s head,
making him go berserk.

At that point he won’t listen to friend or
foe. Arukenimon seems like the better choice.

Agreed. I sensed an...intelligence? of the
kind needed for discussion.

Still, those guys are dead set on sacrificing
kids. How can we make them talk?
Those bastards only see us as fodder, right?

You doubt they’ll listen to what a bunch of
sacrifices have to say, is that it?

Yeah, I’d say not... That’s why we’ve gotta
be the ones doing the stomping.

You sound like a gangster! I bet we could
make a simple conversation work.
Yeah, what she said!
B-but Miu...!
Hmm, what to do, what to do...
Hmm...

(We have to try to talk. That’s the only way
to avoid a fight.)

(Still, I doubt those guys are eager for a
sit-down... I see a fight in our future.)

(Then again, we don’t know a thing about
them. Can’t say anything for sure...)
(Maybe we should...)
Try talking.
Get ready to fight!
Meet them and see.

If talking’s an option, I really think we
should give it a shot.
Yes, exactly.

Still, you think Arukenimon’s looking for
a little chit-chat with the likes of us?

The rest of ’em ain’t no better. Can’t call
a truce if they won’t come to the table.
That’s true...

I think fighting’s our only option. I doubt
they’ll give us the time of day.
Yeah, that’s what I’m saying, man!

And how do you know? They could be way nicer
than you think!
Nicer? We talking about the same guys?
You can’t judge a book by it’s cover, right?

Trust me, I think we’ve seen all the pages we
need to.

Saki’s right. Can’t take such an aggressive
stance without knowing our opponent.
Well, that’s true...

We won’t know the best course of action until
we actually find them.

We don’t know a thing about our opponents,
after all.

Don’t we, though? Those guys serve up human
kids as sacrifices.

Still, there may be some circumstances we’re
missing...

Circumstances? And what, pray tell, would
justify serving up kids like meat?
I mean...

So that means we have to run in there all
guns blazing?

Especially considering we have no idea what
the deal is on their end.
Uh, well I guess that’s true...

Look, Takuma, I’m down for either plan,
but shouldn’t we settle on something?

We’re all over the place right now. No way we
can have a talk while we’re like this.
That’s true...

Uh, hey, Shuuji? Aren’t you going to join in
on the discussion...?
Stop it! I told you to stay away!
Ah, I, I’m so—

Aaah, I can’t take it anymore! I’m sick of
all of this!
Ah, Shuuji?!
What’s wrong...?
Shut up! Shut up, SHUT UP!!!
Ah...

D-Dad... You’re wrong! You’re wrong, I...
I...!
Uhhh... What’s going on with His Blustership?
Dunno, but...it doesn’t look good, does it?

(What in the world? He’s just staring at thin
air and talking to himself...)

Ah...ahhh... Stop... Please stop, I’m begging
you...
AAAAAAAAARGH...!
Holy hell, he’s fast!
He went off on his own?!
Dammit! Now who’s the one dividing us?!
We have to follow him!
